name: Ultra ClayFighter
overview: After years of playing the ClayFighter series and showing off the highest quality content for them, Zool has assembled a team to create a fan update that fans of the original and fighting game fans will both enjoy! Features Include: Updates to normals and special moves New special moves Updated Juggle System featuring Launchers Reduced Lag New Damage Scaling Script by Streetwize Recolored stages and optimized character color palettes by DangerMD Preview of Stage ColorsFull Preview of Costume Colors Updates for Tiny and Bonker color mapping by Darth Marino (Originally from ClayFighter TE-Tiny’s Shorts Fix) New Endings Restored unused audio clips for announcer and characters In Game Movelists at Single Player Character Select
